author: senh
title: Poulter gets late entry to keep European membership
text: BING NEWS: Poulter Gets Late Entry to Keep European Membership Ian Poulter is scrambling to get to Hong Kong to save his European Tour membership, and perhaps his chances of playing the Ryder Cup next year. And he owes it all to former PGA champion Rich Beem. Andy Sullivan and Emiliano Grillo winning tournaments last ... 10/20/2015 - 5:08 am | View Link Poulter in late dash to Hong Kong The Hong Kong Open is the final regular season event on the European Tour schedule but as the tournament entry deadline passed almost a fortnight ago, Poulter needed to find another way to secure his place in the field, with former USPGA Champion Rich Beem ... 10/20/2015 - 4:30 am | View Link Poulter among 30 exempt into PGA Championship The Brit would have gained entry via the Official World Golf Ranking anyway ... giving the United States a 15½-14½ victory over the Internationals. It wasn't until late that the attention drifted to the anchor match at Jack Nicklaus Golf Club Korea ... 08/2/2015 - 6:50 pm | View Link Ryder Cup will bring the best out of me again, says Ian Poulter Photograph: Jim Rogash/Getty Images Ian Poulter arguably needs the upcoming Ryder Cup just as much as his European team-mates need his inspirational ... Ryder Cup plan of Lee Westwood by seeking a late entry to the Wales Open by way of UK-based preparation. 09/3/2014 - 10:41 am | View Link Poulter in fighting trim on eve of tour opener Poulter, who will turn 37 next week, has two PGA Tour victories, including the WGC-HSBC Champions late last year that earned him an invitation ...
